keyPolicies.policyDescription: If we stick to the Conservative Party's long-term economic plan, we expect to get out of deficit and into surplus in the course of the next Parliament.
By further increases to the personal allowance we will reduce the amount of tax taken from the lower paid whilst clamping down on aggressive tax avoidance by the very rich.
A Conservative Government will back the ambitious NHS England programme to close the gap between health and social care. We will put in place a truly 7 day NHS.
We will give a further boost to home ownership, protect the countryside, improve transport and secure our future energy needs.

issues.economy: The Conservatives have played a major part in helping the country to recover from the worst economic crisis in living memory.
issues.governance: Uttlesford District Council and Chelmsford City Council are amongst the best performing councils in the country.
issues.health: A Conservative Government will back the ambitious NHS England programme to close the gap between health and social care.

housing.content: We will give a further boost to home ownership

leaflet.personalStatement: On a personal note I have given long service to this constituency and many of you know me well by now. I believe that my experience can still be a great advantage in promoting the interests of constituents and being the effective advocate of the whole community of Uttlesford and rural Chelmsford in Parliament.

contactInformation.address: Saffron Walden Constituency Conservative Association, The Old Armoury, 3 Museum Street, Saffron Walden, Essex, CB10 1JN.

images.caption: Leaflet cover featuring Alan Haselhurst and the Conservative Party logo.
